definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Unfortunately, this scheme disregards the fact that plasmas are notoriously unstable.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，這個方案未考慮到電漿是出名的不穩定。

sentences.english: For the surface plasmon, two kinds of two dimensional metal periodic arrays are investigated.
sentences.chinese: 在表面電漿方面，我們研究兩種二維的金屬週期結構。
